data.title: Laura Hertzfeld on LinkedIn: WBUR photographers reflect on Boston Marathon bombings ahead of CitySpace‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Boston friends! Swing by WBUR CitySpace between now and April 14 to catch this new photo exhibit commemorating the 10th anniversary of the Boston Marathon‚Ä¶

Le R&D #Lab du projet europ√©en IQ m√©dia vous donne un nouveau rendez-vous üòç üìÖ Le mardi 9 juillet, rejoignez-nous pour la masterclass de Laura Hertzfeld √† 5.30 pm CET (17h30 heure fran√ßaise, webinaire en anglais) : ‚ùì ‚Äú#Storytelling : des outils immersifs pour construire une #audience et une communaut√©‚Äù. Pour y participer üëâ https://bit.ly/3W1UErg üí¨ Laura Hertzfeld pr√©sentera : ‚úîDes exemples de r√©cits immersifs et expliquera comment des nouveaux outils peuvent √™tre utilis√©s pour tous les types d'histoires et de plateformes. ‚úîComment la cr√©ation en r√©alit√© augment√©e ou virtuelle peut nous aider √† mieux appr√©hender les utilisations de l'#IA dans le #journalisme. ‚ùì Laura Hertzfeld est une √©crivaine, √©ditrice et productrice qui accompagne les #m√©dias pour d√©velopper des strat√©gies de contenu, d'engagement et de distribution en ligne. Elle a √©t√© la premi√®re directrice de la collaboration multiplateforme √† la station NPR de Boston, WBUR. Elle a dirig√© le programme de partenariat XR chez Yahoo RYOT Studio. Elle a √©galement travaill√© dans les m√©dias audiovisuels et num√©riques en tant que productrice principale sur "Larry King Now" et a remport√© un Emmy chez NBC pour son travail sur la couverture num√©rique des Jeux olympiques de Rio en 2016. IQ M√©dia est un projet soutenu par L'Union Europ√©enne (UE), coordonn√© par National & Kapodistrian University of Athens. En plus du Groupe Nice-Matin, les autres membres sont : Kathimerini newspaper, Liquid Media SA Group, Alpha TV Cyprus, Associa√ß√£o Portuguesa de Imprensa. #europeanunion #datajournalisme #transformationnumerique #presse #creativeeuropemedia #creativeeurope #Masterclass IQ M√©dia (Webinar in English) : Laura Hertzfeld is our guest on 9 July at 5.30 pm CET. Less is more, how to find new ways to engage your audience ? You can join us here : https://bit.ly/3W1UErg Laura Hertzfeld will showcase examples of immersive storytelling and look at how learning new tools as our industry adapts to technological shifts can be applied across all types of stories and content platforms. Laura will also discuss what creating in AR/VR can teach us about approaching AI initiatives in journalism. Laura Hertzfeld is an Emmy-winning writer, editor, and producer, she is helping media brands develop online content, engagement, and distribution strategies. Most recently, she was the first director of cross-platform collaboration at Boston's NPR station, WBUR. Prior to that, she ran the XR Partner Program at Yahoo RYOT Studio (formerly Verizon Media Group). She also worked in broadcast and digital media as a senior producer on ‚ÄúLarry King Now‚Äù and at NBC won an Emmy for her work on digital coverage of the 2016 Rio Olympics. Co-funded by the European Union, IQ M√©dia is coordinated by the National & Kapodistrian University of Athens. In addition to Groupe Nice-Matin, the other members are : Kathimerini newspaper, Liquid Media SA Group, Alpha TV Cyprus, Associa√ß√£o Portuguesa de Imprensa.

Five Hats is back next week. This week I'm done pretending everything is fine & that I can find my next role on my own‚Ä¶ Friday was the 18th time this year I got referred for something "posted yesterday" & a hiring manager agreed I'd be great but they're actually already on 4th rounds. Honestly, that's preferable & I need your help getting ahead of that! This week is two years since I was laid off at Yahoo. I vividly remember my awesome boss teared up on my last day, sure that the emerging tech creators org I built up from square one, 260 productions, 20m users, 7 awards, "I'd have a new role in no time." I told her that by my analysis, respectfully, I thought she was wrong. I took my severance, started a new company, hustled, RFP'd, interviewed, taught, & never landed anything to support me or my family. I never thought it'd be this bad. If you know of a role, interesting or not‚Äì ping me. If you're looking for someone creative, technical, versatile, passionate, hungry, masters degree & a self-taught quick learner, a clear educator & avid mentor, analytical, diplomatic, with 20 years in startups, corporations, 501s, institutions, impact-driven & growth-driven, then read my Linkedin recommendations & schedule a chat with me on Calendly.com/hwkeyser "Well what role do you want?" -- I hate that question for two reasons: First, beggars can't be choosers & this post isn't me being choosy. I most commonly search producer, program manager, & technologist roles, but I've gone final round or had offers put on hold on CTO, COO, technical artist, game designer, professor, & editor. Second, I'm unashamedly a generalist‚Äì a maker. I got & excelled in the Yahoo role because of my multi-hyphenate experience. Sam Matthews perfectly called me a "player coach" because I lead from the trenches. I'm as game to manage schedules as churn out production art & code, data analysis, design, & user research. Technical art, üôå Game designs & prototypes, üéâ Narrative design & writing, üëç Unity, Unreal, Blender, Excel, Adobe-- I've taught them all. Need to enable new creators or scale a program needing buy-in, üç∞ Just need to script, shoot, and edit videos‚Ä¶ clearly, I still do that. I've gone 4th round on 11 unrelated roles this year ‚Äì I'm not chasing a title, I'm looking to use and deepen my breadth of experience. What I can't do is pretend I'm not living the definition of insanity. I've put effort into 500 job apps, & 1000 more copypasta. 400 lunchers. $XX thousand on conferences. I'm developing a video game to deepen & prove my career options from XR into gaming. And I did that just as an EBITDA-fueled layoffs bomb went off in that industry no less destructive than the metaverse bomb was to VR. I'm not demanding a FAANG salary. I just don't want to take all of the experience I have out of these industries I love & into the first random NYC staffing agency to support my family. Help me help you. #jobseeker #JobSearch #lfw
